ingredients.item: 4 tbsp Veeraswamy Gujarat Masala Curry Paste
2 x 340g packs Waitrose British Chicken Mini Breast Fillets

instructions.step: Preheat the grill to high. Soak 24 wooden skewers in cold water until needed.  Mix the curry paste and 50ml of the coconut cream together in a bowl. Add the chicken and mix carefully to coat all the fillets in the mixture.  Thread each fillet onto a wooden skewer and place the skewers top-to-tail on a rack over a grill pan. Grill for 4-5 minutes. Turn and grill on the other side for a further 4-5 minutes or until thoroughly cooked, the juices run clear and there is no pink meat.  Serve the chicken skewers with the lime wedges and the remaining coconut cream.
